titles.title: PIPE Act
To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a discretionary grant program for drinking water and wastewater infrastructure projects, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Protecting Infrastructure and Promoting the Economy Act or the PIPE Act
This bill requires the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a grant program for drinking water or wastewater infrastructure projects.
